attributes.action: develop a computer system that would allow residents to vote on their stances on issues rather than being forced to choose between representatives [who have their own sets of beliefs]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By asking people to help create a questionnaire on various lifestyle issues (modes of production, waste disposal methods) with which we can create a computer system that would allow us to vote on our stances on issues [rather than being forced to pick a representative living person with their own beliefs] we can democratically and freely discuss the best plans for our resources.
